word_count_calculation_error.description: Expansion engine miscounted words in output
word_count_calculation_error.evidence: Reported 3,980 words but created much larger content

content_replacement_instead_of_addition.description: Engine replaced original content instead of expanding
content_replacement_instead_of_addition.evidence: Net word reduction instead of expansion

template_generation_overflow.description: Generated new document template instead of expanding existing

expansion_content_integration_failure.description: Expansion content not properly integrated with original
expansion_content_integration_failure.evidence: Separate content blocks instead of seamless integration

fractal_worker_deployment_gap.description: Workers spawned but not actually deployed for expansion
fractal_worker_deployment_gap.evidence: 50+ workers created but no actual work coordination

task_allocation_framework_absence.description: No specific task assignment to spawned workers
task_allocation_framework_absence.evidence: Generic worker creation without specialized deployment

parallel_processing_architecture_missing.description: No actual parallel worker execution framework

quality_control_validation_missing.description: No worker output validation or quality gates

satya_truth_violation.violation: Reported successful expansion when contraction occurred

asteya_attribution_gap.violation: Failed to properly attribute worker contributions
asteya_attribution_gap.evidence: Workers spawned but contributions not tracked

ahimsa_harm_through_failure.violation: Expansion failure could harm manuscript submission
ahimsa_harm_through_failure.evidence: Word count reduction jeopardizes academic goals

incremental_expansion_architecture.impact: Cannot add content to existing structure

constitutional_compliance_integration.description: Constitutional constraints not embedded in expansion logic

incremental_expansion_pipeline.function: Add content to specific manuscript sections without replacement
incremental_expansion_pipeline.implementation: Read original, identify insertion points, add content, preserve structure

real_time_word_count_monitor.function: Track expansion progress with real-time metrics
real_time_word_count_monitor.implementation: Before/after word counting with expansion verification

constitutional_compliance_layer.function: Ensure all operations comply with Satya, Asteya, Ahimsa
constitutional_compliance_layer.implementation: Real-time validation gates for constitutional compliance

fractal_worker_orchestration.function: Deploy spawned workers for specific expansion tasks
fractal_worker_orchestration.implementation: Task allocation, parallel processing, quality validation

proxy_evidence_integration.function: Integrate proxy evidence tables into manuscript flow
proxy_evidence_integration.implementation: Context-aware evidence insertion with academic formatting

recommendations: Build proxy evidence seamless integration system
